sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>sick</radical> <radical>sheep</radical> is <kanji>itchy</kanji> and it can barely sit still. Help the poor sheep!
meaningInfo: Imagine you were itchy but you couldn't scratch the spot. Now that you know how the sick sheep feels, give it a hand!
readingMnemonic: Even though the sheep is <kanji>itchy</kanji>, look how <reading>kah-yu</reading>te (<ja>かゆ</ja>) it is! It’s not just cute. It’s kah-yute!
